publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3114.1 Pauline McNeill: Glasgow Trongate Regeneration-As an amendment to motion (S1M-3114) in the name of Ms Sandra White, leave out from "pledges" to end and insert "notes with concern that the Trongate area of Glasgow has suffered from neglect and decline in recent years whilst other parts of the city have benefited from regeneration and appreciates the concerns of local traders in that regard; is pleased to note that Glasgow City Council has approved a five year regeneration plan for the area and has made budget provision for a range of immediate projects including public realm improvements, shop front improvements, shop front replacement, new street lighting and signage and a major area marketing programme, and considers that Glasgow MSPs should express their full support for the council initiative and for the development of further co-operative projects involving the community, businesses and local authority."
